## JsPlumbInstance.deleteConnection() method

Delete the given connection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deleteConnection(connection: Connection, params?: DeleteConnectionOptions): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  connection | [Connection](./core.connection) | Connection to delete. |
|  params | [DeleteConnectionOptions](./core.deleteconnectionoptions) | Optional extra parameters. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
